programme.title: Godzilla vs. Gigan
programme.desc: Godzilla and Angorus fight three-headed dragon Ghidrah and huge bird Gigan at a cartoonist's theme park.

programme.title: Pure
programme.desc: An insecure girl grapples with fears of embracing her sexuality.

programme.title: I Saw the TV Glow
programme.desc: A classmate introduces teenage Owen to a mysterious late-night TV show -- a vision of a supernatural world beneath their own. In the pale glow of the television, Owen's view of reality begins to crack.

programme.title: Superman: Red Son
programme.desc: An alternate take on Superman portrays him as a Soviet hero after his rocket lands in the USSR.

programme.title: Justice League Dark: Apokolips War
programme.desc: Following the decimation of Earth, the Justice League regroups to take on Darkseid and save the remaining survivors.

programme.title: Justice League: Doom
programme.desc: Vandal Savage uses stolen information from Batman's secret files to mastermind a plan to exterminate the Justice League.

programme.title: Justice League: The Flashpoint Paradox
programme.desc: The Flash causes a temporal ripple that creates a fractured reality where the Justice league has never formed, Superman does not exist and a war rages between Wonder Woman and Aquaman. Flash teams with Batman and Cyborg to restore the timeline.

programme.title: Justice League: War
programme.desc: Superman (Alan Tudyk), Wonder Woman (Michelle Monaghan), Batman (Jason O'Mara) and other superheroes join forces to save Earth from Darkseid.

programme.title: Justice League: Warworld
programme.desc: Kidnapped and transported to a strange world, Batman, Superman and Wonder Woman unite to form a resistance and lead the planet to freedom.

programme.title: Woman in Gold
programme.desc: Maria Altmann, an elderly Jewish survivor of World War II, sues the Austrian government for the return of artwork the Nazis stole from her family.

programme.title: The Iron Claw
programme.desc: The true story of the Von Erich brothers, who, through tragedy and triumph, under the shadow of their domineering father and coach, seek epic immortality on the biggest stage in sports.

programme.title: Need for Speed
programme.desc: Determined to take down his treacherous rival (Dominic Cooper), a street-car racer (Aaron Paul) runs through a cross-country net of cops and bounty hunters to enter the most prestigious race in the underground racing circuit.

programme.title: Love Lies Bleeding
programme.desc: A bodybuilder heading through town to Vegas is thrust into the dangerous plot of a violent crime family when she falls into a steamy romance with her trainer.

programme.title: The Sitter
programme.desc: The world's worst baby sitter (Jonah Hill) takes a brood of rambunctious children (Max Records, Landry Bender, Kevin Hernandez) on a wild night-time odyssey through New York.

programme.title: Wild Mountain Thyme
programme.desc: Rosemary has her heart set on winning Anthony's affections. Having been stung by his father's plan to sell his farm in Ireland to his American nephew, Anthony is jolted into pursuing his dreams.

programme.title: College Football
programme.desc: The premier matchup in Week 0 of the NCAA football season sees the No. 10 Seminoles face the Yellow Jackets. Florida State added former Clemson quarterback DJ Uiagalelei as a graduate transfer from Oregon State to help defend its ACC championship.

programme.title: College Football
programme.desc: The No. 19 Hurricanes open a crucial campaign versus the Gators. Coach Mario Cristobal enters his third year at Miami with a 12-13 record, but with a new hope under center in Cam Ward. Florida seeks its first winning season under Billy Napier.

programme.title: College Football
programme.desc: Tobacco Road rivals link up in Chapel Hill, N.C., as the Wolfpack visit the Tar Heels. NC State can lock both teams up at 6-6, and 3-5 in ACC play, with a win. North Carolina leads the rivalry series 68-39-6, but NC State has won 12 of the past 17.

programme.title: College Football
programme.desc: The Panthers and Mountaineers contest another edition of the Backyard Brawl. The schools have traded wins since reigniting the rivalry in 2022 after West Virginia's 17-6 home victory last year. Pittsburgh is 2-0 after edging out Cincinnati in Week 2.

programme.title: College Football
programme.desc: The Mustangs match up with the No. 22 Cardinals for the first time in 40 years. In Week 5, SMU improved to 4-1 following a convincing win over Florida State. Louisville dropped in the national rankings after losing 31-24 at then-No. 16 Notre Dame.

programme.title: College Football
programme.desc: Another leg of the Commonwealth Clash gets underway when Virginia Tech hosts Virginia. The Cavaliers lead the ongoing 2024-25 Clash 5-0. However, the Hokies have won three straight meetings on the gridiron, and 22 of the past 24 overall.
